SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.contracts.models.accounts.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckingAccount, CreditAccount, CurrencyAccount, SavingsAccount
public abstract class Account extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a bank account. Implements Serializable interface for object serialization.
See Also:
